ComicInfo.Title: To Judge A Nighthawk!; Don't Let the Sun Come Up on Me!
ComicInfo.Summary:
To Judge A Nighthawk!: Mindy Williams tries to kill Nighthawk.
Don't Let the Sun Come Up on Me!: Nighthawk saves a crippled girl from a collapsing building.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:50:16. [Issue ID 35045]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
